title: [DOC] Fill in missing docstrings
body:
#### Describe the issue linked to the documentation Our documentation is a bit patchy in some places, filling in the missing information would be a great help! Thanks to @chrisholder for creating the list! | File | Comments | Github link | | ------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | sktime/benchmarking/data.py | Multiple methods classes
undocumented | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/data.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/data.py) | | sktime/benchmarking/evaluation.py | Parameters for constructor and
some methods missing | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/evaluation.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/evaluation.py) | | sktime/benchmarking/metrics.py | Multiple methods classes
undocumented | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/metrics.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/metrics.py) | | sktime/benchmarking/orchestration.py | Multiple methods classes
undocumented | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/orchestration.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/orchestration.py) | | sktime/benchmarking/results.py | No docstrings | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/results.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/results.py) | | sktime/benchmarking/strategies.py | Some docstring exist but couple
methods and constructors missing
parameter details | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/strategies.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/benchmarking/strategies.py) | | sktime/classification/base.py | Some docstring exist but couple
methods and constructors missing
parameter details | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/base.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/base.py) | | sktime/classification/compose/\_boss.py | No docstring for IndividualBOSS | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/dictionary\_based/\_boss.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/dictionary_based/_boss.py) | | sktime/classification/compose/\_tde.py | No dcotstring for IndividualTDE | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/dictionary\_based/\_tde.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/dictionary_based/_tde.py) | | sktime/classification/compose/\_weasel.py | One or two methods missing
docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/dictionary\_based/\_weasel.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/dictionary_based/_weasel.py) | | sktime/classification/distance\_based/\_elastice\_ensemble.py | One or two methods missing
docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/distance\_based/\_elastic\_ensemble.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/distance_based/_elastic_ensemble.py) | | sktime/classification/distance\_based/\_proximity\_forest.py | Docstring is not numpy format.
Methods have wrong docstring
format | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/distance\_based/\_proximity\_forest.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/distance_based/_proximity_forest.py) | | sktime/classification/interval\_based/\_tsf.py | Some method missing params
docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/interval\_based/\_tsf.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/classification/interval_based/_tsf.py) | | sktime/distances/elastic.py | No docstrings | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/distances/elastic.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/distances/elastic.py) | | sktime/distances/elastic\_cython.pyx | No docstrings | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/distances/elastic\_cython.pyx](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/distances/elastic_cython.pyx) | | sktime/forecasting/theta.py | Method update missing docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/theta.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/theta.py) | | sktime/forecasting/compose/\_pipeline.py | Some docstring but constructor,
transform, inver\_transform missing
docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/compose/\_pipeline.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/compose/_pipeline.py) | | sktime/forecasting/compose/\_reduce.py | Some docstring but BaseReducer
constructor missing docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/compose/\_reduce.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/compose/_reduce.py) | | sktime/forecasting/compose/\_stack.py | Some docstring but constructor for
StackingForecasters missing
docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/compose/\_stack.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/compose/_stack.py) | | sktime/forecasting/model\_selection/\_split.py | Couple methods and constructors
missing docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/model\_selection/\_split.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/model_selection/_split.py) | | sktime/forecasting/model\_selection/\_tune.py | Some docstring but very limited
and many methods missing
parameter docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/model\_selection/\_tune.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/forecasting/model_selection/_tune.py) | | sktime/performance\_metrics/forecasting/\_classes.py | No docstrings | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/performance\_metrics/forecasting/\_classes.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/performance_metrics/forecasting/_classes.py) | | sktime/series\_as\_features/base/estimators/\_ensemble.py | Some docstring but very limited | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/series\_as\_features/base/estimators/\_ensemble.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/series_as_features/base/estimators/_ensemble.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/compose.py | Some docstring but missing a few | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/compose.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/compose.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/interpolate.py | Missing docstring parameters for
constructor | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/interpolate.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/interpolate.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/matrix\_profile.py | Missing docstring parameters for
MatrixProfile constructor | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/matrix\_profile.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/matrix_profile.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/padder.py | Missing docstring parameters for
PaddingTransformer constructor | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/padder.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/padder.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/reduce.py | Missing docstring parameters for
Tabularizer constructor | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/reduce.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/reduce.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/shapelets.py | Most of the static methods missing
docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/shapelets.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/shapelets.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/tsfresh.py | Docstring complete for methods but
all constructors need completing | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/tsfresh.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/tsfresh.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/dictionary\_based/\_paa.py | Docstring for set\_num\_intervals
methods needs completing | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/dictionary\_based/\_paa.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/dictionary_based/_paa.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/dictionary\_based/\_sfa.py | Docstring for transform method
needs doing. Additionally the
class methods and static methods
need docstrings | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/dictionary\_based/\_sfa.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/dictionary_based/_sfa.py) | | sktime/transformers/panel/summarize/\_extract.py | Docstring for
DerivativeSlopeTransformer needs
doing | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/summarize/\_extract.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/panel/summarize/_extract.py) | | sktime/transformers/series/boxcox.py | No docstrings | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/series/boxcox.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/series/boxcox.py) | | sktime/transformers/series/summarize.py | No docstrings | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/series/summarize.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/transformers/series/summarize.py) | | sktime/blob/master/sktime/utils/boxcox.py | boxcox\_normmax missing docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/utils/boxcox.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/utils/boxcox.py) | | sktime/utils/load\_data.py | load\_from\_arff\_to\_dataframe
needs docstring.
load\_from\_ucr\_tsv\_to\_dataframe
needs docstring.
generate\_example\_long\_table
needs docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/utils/load\_data.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/utils/load_data.py) | | sktime/utils/validation/forecasting.py | check\_step\_length needs
docstring. check\_cutoffs
needs docstring. check\_scoring
needs docstring | [https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/utils/validation/forecasting.py](https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/blob/master/sktime/utils/validation/forecasting.py) |
